# SENTINEL-2

Sentinel-2 is a constellation of two satellites in the same orbit, monitoring Earth's surface changes.


> ### Specifications
> 
> - Operation since: 2015 (Sentinel-2A) / 2017 (2B)
> - Temporal Resolution: 5 days (10 days with one satellite) on equator
